caption.p: The spatial patterns of PR for 10-year ( a– c), 20-year ( d– f) and 100-year TXx ( g– i) under 1.5 °C (first column) and 2.0 °C (second column) global warming and the additional warming of 0.5 °C (third column) based on stabilized simulations. The maps were plotted with NCL 6.2.1 (free software; http://www.ncl.ucar.edu/).
